data.text: @haleem967 @marcorobinson7 Thankfully I don't live in fear
@haleem967 @marcorobinson7 Ive never worn one yet and Ive never had covid and work in a supermarket. They are about as much use as a chocolate fireguard
@marcorobinson7 Can’t believe he’s the audacity to darken our shore. But clearly trying to elevate himself on the global stage.  Always the actor.

@marcorobinson7 It was only for the photos. The Queen adores Trudeau. She invited him for tea and isn't wearing one either. Are you calling here irresponsible, too? Get a grip!

No so, with toxic starmer.
